title: RECIPE: Golden Milk A.K.A. Turmeric Latte
directions: Heat milk with a steamer or in a small saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in coconut sugar (or honey) and vanilla, remove from heat.
Add hot milk and all remaining ingredients to a blender, blend until frothy.
ingredients: 1 cup almond, cashew, or coconut milk (I like switching up the milks but coconut is my favorite)
1 teaspoon dried or finely chopped fresh turmeric
1/2 teaspoon dried ginger or chopped fresh ginger
